body.name: SinLoon PC 8 Channels Fan Hub Knob Cooling Fan Speed Controller for CPU Case HDD VGA PWM Fan PCI Bracket 12V Fan Control- SATA Interface Power Supply (SATA 1Knob)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 17 mins
features: 【Knob Adjust】High accuracy and good performance, equipped with an independent speed controller and the speed can be adjusted at will.Adjustment Method: 1 Manual Adjustment Knob.
【Function】PC 8 Channels Fan Hub Reduce speed to reduce noise & power consumption when computer parts are free. Increase speed to reduce computer part temperature when computer parts are busy.
【Material】 Knob Cooling Fan Speed Controller adopts plastic and metal materials, durable, reliable, with low loss and low heat.
【Universal】Widely used for PC computer water cooling system, easy to install.Fan Interface: 4PIN (3PIN Can be connected).Power Supply Interface: SATA interface.
【Save space】SinLoon PC 8 Channels Fan Hub The governor is installed in the PCI position of the chassis, which is convenient for installation and does not take up space.
body.description: Product Specifications: Item Type:Cooling Fan Speed Controller Material:Plastic+Metal Supply Voltage: 0-12V Connectable Fans: 8 Fan Interface: 4PIN (3PIN Can be connected) Power: 35W Adjustment Method: 1 Manual Adjustment Knob Power Supply Interface: SATA interface Installation Position: PCI Position of PC Chassis Package: 1 x Cooling Fan Speed Controller Made of high-quality material, durable, firm and stable Professional high speed regulating circuit, high performance, support for SATA interface Universal: Widely used for PC computer water cooling system, easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for NON- PWM fans.
reviews.reviewText: I use this to control 8 fans on my external water cooling radiators. Works great. Great price and fast delivery. Is well made and sturdy. The single knob makes it easy for me to set my preferred fan speed and keep the noise to a minimum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cannot deliver consistent power
reviews.reviewText: When installed, the fans plugged into it will constantly ramp up and down somewhere around 10% of their power. Maybe 20. Either way, once you notice it you can’t ignore it. In addition, the power settings are wack. Turn the knob 1mm, 35% jump in fan speed. Turn it ten more- nothing until the next ramp point. When the fan is constantly ramping up and down and the knob is in the right spot it will go from 50% to 100% over and over and over again.It’s an emergency backup, because it CAN control speed. There’s just no way to dial it in that I can see.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 8 fan hub as described
reviews.reviewText: This unit can accommodate 3 pin and 4 pin fans. I imagine 2 pins would also work, but I didn't try one.The one knob regulates their speed. Worked flawlessly for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Low Watt Fans ONLY!
reviews.reviewText: If you are buying this for fans that need 30W-60W channels this is definitely not the controller you are looking for! So if you are running fans that push 240 CFM this is going to be a serious waste of your time, money, and fans potential. If you are just running cheap fans with low wattage this will work fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Used this to build a gaming rig. It was nice to have something I can plug all of my fans into neatly and be able to control the speed at the same time. Doesn’t seem to have too much juice behind it but just enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive but also cheaply made. Buy something better and save the headache.
reviews.reviewText: I thought the price was maybe a bit too good to be true. Seemed like this was going to be perfect for what I need but I got it all hooked up and two of my fans weren't on. I went back to the card and disconnected and reconnected everything to make sure it was right and the sata port was loosely soldered (you could easy move it with your finger one one end of it). I guess it's possibly fixable but since I bought this to power some not cheap fans I'll just get higher quality items next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not bad, not great
reviews.reviewText: Arrived with the pins on 3 fan headers bent pretty badly. Not surprised since it was shipped in a cardboard box with no protective materials. Not a big deal since I only needed 2 headers anyway. Horrible bright red led on the board that serves no purpose. Plugging 2 fans into a single channel (there are 4 channels on the board, each with 2 headers) appears to halve the power each fan gets, so really only good for 4 total fans. Speed control isn't very granular, seems to only be off, half, full. Otherwise it works well enough for what I wanted it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DOA (Dead on arrival)
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited to have a control know along with normal pmw function. When it got here I tucked it away and ordered a SATA extension to be able to put it in the back rack with the other pcie interfaces. the extensoin came and I pluged it in... and nothing. dead on arrival. I returned it today. I kept the SATA extension as i'm a pack rat when it comes to varied form factor interfaces for the same dozen things that pc's need.

Did I miss it?Does it say in descriptions that this card will not fit above PCI card slot?It is designed to occupy an entire PCI-Express slot without actually connecting to it.PCI is little bit higher than the PCI-Express.Card's printboard pushes against the upper edge of PCI and will not allow mounting.Thankfully, this device's schematic is very basic and clean-careful removal of port 8 (or port 1?) did not affect functionality.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not a true PWM fan speed controller
reviews.reviewText: Not a true PWM fan speed controller. No PWM output signal. Appear to just control fan speed by changing output voltage. Controller did not work for my bigger fans but did work for small ones.
